## Connection.setShadowState() method

Changes the connection's shadow block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setShadowState(shadowState: blocks.State | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shadowState | [blocks.State](./blockly.serialization.blocks.state.md) \| null | An state represetation of the block or null. |

**Returns:**

void
